page.title: 13ROSSINGTON SWIMMING CLUB
page.content: The Rossington Swimming Association meet as a club every weekday except Tuesday. Members range from six year olds to adults, as a person's swimming improves he/she is moved to a higher group. Badges can be won at each level. The swimming groups start at the three foot depth and work their way up to the ten foot depth as they improve. The advanced group practise length swimming for speed and style they therefore use the whole of the pool. The Rossington Swimming Pool was opened in 1966. The pool itself measures 25 metres by 10 metres. The Rossington swimming baths are opened to the public afternoons and weekends. The baths are also used by local schools and by the R.A.F. at Finningley for survival training.
